page.title: 04BENNETTS END HEMEL HEMPSTEAD
page.content: This area is residential. There is a wide variety of housing in Bennetts End such as council, terraced, semi-detached and detached houses, flats and bungalows. In Longdean Park Estate the houses are all architect designed. In the area there is a primary school, Chambersbury C.P. Also there is a secondary school, Longdean, the largest mixed school in Hertfordshire. At Bennetts End there is a church, St Benedicts built in the 1960s. There are also across the road a selection of shops for the local community. To the right there is a Community Centre and playing fields, with tennis courts and swings. There are many open spaces for children to play safely except for the menace of dogs' excreta.
